query.pigql: q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'CSAT' >= -10; ENDTOTAL = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "false"; updcreatedTOTAL = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "LastYearCompare").asDateRange("date('CreatedDate_Year','CreatedDate_Month','CreatedDate_Day')")}}; updclosedTOTAL = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('${Constants.ClosedDate}_Year','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Month','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Day')")}};compare = group updcreatedTOTAL by all full, updclosedTOTAL by all full, ENDTOTAL by all; compare = foreach compare generate 100*(avg(updclosedTOTAL.'CSAT')-avg(updcreatedTOTAL.'CSAT'))/avg(updcreatedTOTAL.'CSAT') as 'perc_Percent', (case when 100*(avg(updclosedTOTAL.'CSAT')-avg(updcreatedTOTAL.'CSAT'))/avg(updcreatedTOTAL.'CSAT') < 0 then "#ff545f" when 100*(avg(updclosedTOTAL.'CSAT')-avg(updcreatedTOTAL.'CSAT'))/avg(updcreatedTOTAL.'CSAT') > 0 then "#ee9f77" else "#32b181" end) as 'color';

Measure.display: Backlog Count at Start of Month
Backlog Count at Start of Week
Backlog Count at Start of Day
Backlog Count at Start of Day
Backlog Count at Start of Week
Backlog Count at Start of Month

query.pigql: q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'CSAT' <= 34; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "false"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate count() as count;

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'CSAT' <= {{coalesce(cell(kpi_bottom_quartile.result, 0, "per_CSAT"),0).asObject()}}; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "false"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate count() as count;

lens_table.query: q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}"; q = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('${Constants.ClosedDate}_Year','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Month','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Day')")}}; q = foreach q generate 'CaseNumber', first('Account.Name') as 'Account.Name', ${Constants.CaseCSATQuery} ${Constants.CaseFCRQuery}  first('${Constants.CaseType}') as '${Constants.CaseType}', first('Owner.Name') as 'Owner.Name', ${Constants.CaseSLAQuery} avg('{{column(Static_Duration.selection, ["pigql_value"]).asObject()}}') as '{{column(Static_Duration.selection, ["measure_field"]).asObject()}}', first('${Constants.CaseOrigin}') as '${Constants.CaseOrigin}', first('${Constants.CaseSeverityLevel}') as '${Constants.CaseSeverityLevel}', first('${Constants.CaseStatus}') as '${Constants.CaseStatus}', ${Constants.CaseSupportLevelQuery} first('IsEscalated') as 'Escalated' ; q = order q by 'CaseNumber' desc; q = limit q 100;

query.pigql: q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'CSAT' >= -10; q = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "false"; q = group q by all; q = foreach q generate percentile_disc(0.25) within group (order by 'CSAT' asc) as 'per_CSAT';

q = load "${App.EdgeMarts.ServiceCase.Alias}"; q = filter q by 'CSAT' >= -10; ENDTOTAL = filter q by 'IsClosed' == "false"; updcreatedTOTAL = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "LastPeriodCompare").asDateRange("date('CreatedDate_Year','CreatedDate_Month','CreatedDate_Day')")}}; updclosedTOTAL = filter q by {{cell(Time_Selection.selection, 0, "Current").asDateRange("date('${Constants.ClosedDate}_Year','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Month','${Constants.ClosedDate}_Day')")}};compare = group updcreatedTOTAL by all full, updclosedTOTAL by all full, ENDTOTAL by all; compare = foreach compare generate 100*(avg(updclosedTOTAL.'CSAT')-avg(updcreatedTOTAL.'CSAT'))/avg(updcreatedTOTAL.'CSAT') as 'perc_Percent', (case when 100*(avg(updclosedTOTAL.'CSAT')-avg(updcreatedTOTAL.'CSAT'))/avg(updcreatedTOTAL.'CSAT') < 0 then "#f2536d" when 100*(avg(updclosedTOTAL.'CSAT')-avg(updcreatedTOTAL.'CSAT'))/avg(updcreatedTOTAL.'CSAT') > 0 then "#3CAF6D" else "#32b181" end) as 'color';
